display_long_description:
# Summer-themed Update(7/3 ~ 8/31)
Celebrate the season with our special summer event!
Enjoy a refreshed beach-themed lobby, characters in fun summer outfits, and new summer music.
We've also added **Mixed Reality (MR)** support — toggle passthrough mode in settings and experience your favorite sports like never before.

# Play 16 sports in one action-packed game.
All-In-One Sports brings the excitement of real sports to your headset with intuitive controls, realistic physics, and fast-paced gameplay.

Enjoy a wide range of activities including **Table Tennis, Soccer, Boxing, Basketball, Golf, Bowling, Badminton, Hockey, Darts, Archery, Tennis, Baseball, Volleyball, Squash, Billiards, and Kung-Fu** — all in one place.

Choose from multiple difficulty levels and game modes, play solo or challenge friends in multiplayer. Each sport is designed for fun, movement, and replayability.

Whether you're here for competition or casual play, All-In-One Sports delivers quick, energetic sessions that keep you coming back.

One game. All your favorite sports.


# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2

display_long_description_unprocessed:
# Summer-themed Update(7/3 ~ 8/31)
Celebrate the season with our special summer event!
Enjoy a refreshed beach-themed lobby, characters in fun summer outfits, and new summer music.
We've also added **Mixed Reality (MR)** support — toggle passthrough mode in settings and experience your favorite sports like never before.

# Play 16 sports in one action-packed game.
All-In-One Sports brings the excitement of real sports to your headset with intuitive controls, realistic physics, and fast-paced gameplay.

Enjoy a wide range of activities including **Table Tennis, Soccer, Boxing, Basketball, Golf, Bowling, Badminton, Hockey, Darts, Archery, Tennis, Baseball, Volleyball, Squash, Billiards, and Kung-Fu** — all in one place.

Choose from multiple difficulty levels and game modes, play solo or challenge friends in multiplayer. Each sport is designed for fun, movement, and replayability.

Whether you're here for competition or casual play, All-In-One Sports delivers quick, energetic sessions that keep you coming back.

One game. All your favorite sports.


# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2
